name: Underground River Mouths
description: Where underground rivers emerge to the surface, creating unique ecosystems and potential access to cave systems. The flowing water provides fresh water and transportation, while the underground connection can lead to valuable resources or dangers.
atmosphere: Hidden rivers emerge from cave systems while crystal-clear water creates oases in otherwise dry landscapes. The sudden appearance of flowing water supports unique plant and animal communities as cool air flows from the underground source. Natural spring fed by mysterious depths.
